price: Hindi ba Iyon ay Nakakakaya na magbigay-buhay sa mga patay?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
